reviews.customers_say: Customers love this summer dress for its beautiful print, comfortable elastic straps, and perfect above-the-knee length, making it ideal for vacation and casual gatherings. They appreciate the pockets, with one customer noting they stay hidden while functional, and find it soft and comfortable to wear in summer heat. The material thickness receives mixed feedback - while some find it nice, others mention it's pretty thin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10/10
items.body: Highly recommend. Cute! Comfortable! And fit really well. Pockets are a plus. Took on a trip and it didn‚Äôt get wrinkled in my suitcase. Pretty well made considering. Read more
items.author: Heather W

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect summer dress
items.body: This dress is adorable. It fits well and the color is super cute. It washes up great. Read more
items.author: Nicolette Halvorson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute light weight dress. Beautiful and comfortable!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Very cute and flattering dress. Material is super comfortable, lightweight and stretchy. NOT SEE THROUGH, but only one layer of fabric. If stretched excessively, it's the kind you can see the elastic. üôÅ However a small fits me perfectly and I do not have this issue! I have to exchange this particular dress, because there was a snag in the waist and will potentially become a hole, but I am happy to rebuy this dress and hopefully wont have the same issue! Read more
items.author: Ryon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: This dress is perfect for anything. Feminine, perfect length, comfortable, flattering, and a great go-to. I love the pockets. The skirt has a slight twirl to it. I was hit on several times when i went out wearing this. Definitely recommend. Read more
items.author: Kelley O'Hara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute!
items.body: It fits well? Looks so cute and feels cool Love the pockets. It's good material and I like the wider straps that has a little stretch and stays put. I like it so much I also ordered the yellow and the blue. I get lots of compliments too. Read more
items.author: Virginia R.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sheet but cute
items.body: Super cute dress, the fitting was great but the material was a bit sheer not ideal for a quick throw on look. Read more
items.author: Neida Chavez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect summer dress ‚Äî cute, comfy, and flattering!
items.body: I love this knee-length summer dress! The fabric is lightweight and breathable, perfect for hot days. It fits true to size and has a really flattering flowy shape that doesn‚Äôt cling. The length hits just right at the knee, making it great for casual outings, picnics, or even dressing up with wedges and jewelry. The colors are vibrant and hold up well after washing. Super easy to throw on and still look put together ‚Äî definitely one of my favorite warm-weather pieces! ‚òÄÔ∏èüëóüíê Read more
items.author: C. Locklear

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pocket dress, oh yes!
items.body: Great dress with pockets!! Comfortable and cute. This pattern doesn't show wrinkles so bonus for packing it. Read more
items.author: Michelle S.

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink Flower-52, Green Flower-43, Blue Flower-55, Pink Flower-50, Summer Flower-57, Black-02, Red Flower-47, Yellow Floral-1, Navy Blue-03, Pink Flower-39, Spring Flower-38, Orange Flower - 33, Spring Flower-36, Large Pink Flowers. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
